title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2480/96 of 18 December 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1226/92 on communication by the Member States to the Commission of information on imports of certain products processed from fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2480/96 of 18 December 1996 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1226/92 on communication by the Member States to the Commission of information on imports of certain products processed from fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 1226/92 is replaced by the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following that of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 July 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 254, 8. 10. 1996, p. 1.
(2) See page 25 of this Official Journal.
(3) OJ No L 128, 14. 5. 1992, p. 18.
(4) OJ No L 105, 9. 5. 1995, p. 3.
ANNEX
